resources.string: Not enough money or you\'ve have already been responding
60 $ cut out of your money.Do you want that ?

It was developed by Mamanov Dinmuhammad.Developed in his tenth lesson at the Gita Academy of programming.4 Pics 1 Word\'s gameplay is very simple: each level displays four pictures linked by one word - the player\'s aim is to work out what the word is, from a set of letters given below the pictures. The game is said to follow the freemium model: although the game is free, microtransactions are available to help the user progress through the game more quickly.
